description: This file is a Dart script that serves as a command-line utility to perform continuous integration (CI) analysis for a Flutter app project. It changes the working directory to the app's directory, fetches dependencies with 'flutter pub get', runs 'flutter analyze' to perform static code analysis, and reports success or failure messages.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point that performs directory verification, dependency fetching, and static analysis for the Flutter app.
